rukus.text: 68|34|Hontōni arrā o osoreru mono ni taishite wa,-nushi no omoto ni ki kobi no rakuen ga arou.
68|35|Ware wa shinjinbukai-sha-tachi o, tsumibito no yō ni atsukau to demo iu no ka.
68|36|Anata gata wa dō shita no ka. Anata gata wa dō handan suru no ka.
68|37|Soretomo anata gata ni wa, manabu ni tariru Keisuke ga aru no ka.
68|38|Anata gata ga erabu mono wa, nani demo sono Keisuke no naka ni aru no ka.
68|39|Soretomo anata gata wa, shinpan no hi made yūkōna seiyaku o wareto musunda no ka. Anata gataga shiryobunbetsu suru koto wa, tashikani anata gata no mono ni naru no ka.
68|40|(Muhanmado yo) kare-ra ni toe. `Kare-ra no dare ga sore o hoshō suru nodesu ka.'
68|41|Matawa, kare-ra wa (omoni) haisuru mono ga aru no ka. Kare-ra ga tadashī nonara, sono haisuru mono o tsurete kitasa se nasai.
68|42|Sune ga, gen wa ni sa reru hi (o omoi nasai). Kare-ra wa sajida suru yō motome rareru. Daga kare-ra ni wa dekinaidearou.
68|43|Kare-ra wa me o fuse, kutsujoku o kōmurudearou. Sajida suru yō, tashika ni kare-ra wa yobikake rarete ita. Sonotoki gotai manzokunanoni (kyohi shita).
68|44|Sokode kono o kotoba (kuruān) o kyogidearu to suru mono o ware ni makase yo. Ware wa kare-ra ga kidzukanai hōmen kara, ippo ichiichi (daraku ni) michibiki,
68|45|kare-ra o yūyo surudearou. Hontōni ware no keiryaku wa tsuyoku tashikadearu.
68|46|Soretomo anata ga kare-ra ni hōshū o motome, sore de kare-ra wa futan o kase rareta no ka.
68|47|Mata yūgen-kai ga kare-ra no temoto ni ari, sore de kare-ra wa (sore o) kakikudasu koto ga dekiru no ka.
68|48|Dakara nintai shite, anata no omo no meirei o mate. Sakana no tomo no yōdeatte wa naranai. Kurushi-sa no amari (kare ga) sakenda toki (no yō ni).
68|49|-Nushi kara no onkei ga kare ni tasshinakattanaraba, kare wa tsumi o owasa re, fumenboku ni fumōnochi ni suteraretadearou.
68|50|Kono yō ni omo wa, kare o erabi seigi no to no hitori to nasa reta.
68|51|Fushinjin-sha wa keikoku o kiku toki, sono (monosugoi) metsuki de, anata o 凡 Ndo taoren bakari ni suru. Kare-ra wa iu. `Hontōni kare wa tsuka reta monodesu.'
68|52|Daga, kono (kuruān) koso wa, ban'yū no tame no kunkai nihokanaranai.
